text: geuleul san aegub-in-i geuui a naeege malhagileul jal bosalpeosiyo i aeneun ama uliege yuyonghal geos-iyo animyeon geuleul adeullo sam-eubsi da hadeola geuleohge hayeo hananim-eun yoseb-eul ttang-e geojuke hago kkum-ui haemong-eul galeuchyeossnola hananim-eun wanjeonhangwonneung-eul gajigo gyesina salamdeul-eun alji moshadeola
